price: ߘߎ߰ ߘߏ߲ߞߏ ߟߎ߫ ߖߊ߲߬ߖߏ߲ ߛߊ߲߬ߘߊ ߟߴߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߦߋ߫ ߸ ߕߎ߬ߡߊ ߡߍ߲ ߞߋߟߊ ߟߎ߫ ߣߊ߬ ߘߴߏ߬ ߟߎ߫ ߡߊ߬
arabic: وَٱضۡرِبۡ لَهُم مَّثَلًا أَصۡحَٰبَ ٱلۡقَرۡيَةِ إِذۡ جَآءَهَا ٱلۡمُرۡسَلُونَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: wa-iḍ'rib lahum mathalan aṣḥāba al-qaryati idh jāahā al-mur'salūna
